newsitem.title: CYPRUS: Cyprus issues 14 mln pounds of government bonds.
newsitem.headline: Cyprus issues 14 mln pounds of government bonds.

text.p: The Central Bank of Cyprus will issue registered government development stock worth 14 million pounds ($29.9 million) on October 17, the bank said on Thursday.
The development stock has a three year maturity and an interest rate of 7 percent per year, payable every six months.
Interest earned by individuals from government development stocks is exempted from income tax without limitations.
The bank said the issue encourages savings and raising funds for government development projects. The funds are deposited in the Development Fund of the Republic.
Applications for the issue are accepted from October 4 to 16 1996. ($=0.46 pounds)
